page.title: 05RELIGIONS, KINGSTON
page.content: In our school we have children of many different religions. Here are some of them_Church of England, Roman Catholic, Plymouth Brethren, Muslim, Hindu and Sikh. There are many churches in Kingston, a new Mosque has just opened in Acre Road. We had a Catholic Church, a Church of England and a Plymouth Brethren Meeting Room in our survey area. In school we have Assembly on Monday, Wednesday and Friday in the school hall. On Tuesday we have lower school hymn practise and on Thursday we have a Bible story for all three classes in the second year. At Christmas time we had a Nativity play by the first year classes and at Easter a third year class did an Easter assembly.
